dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4231 IH: To prohibit United States assistance to the East-West Center.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit United States assistance to the East-West Center.

section.header: Prohibition on United States assistance to the East-West Center
section.text: No funds available to the Department of State or any other department or agency may be used to provide assistance to the Center for Cultural and Technical Interchange Between East and West (commonly known as the East-West Center).
